metadata.synopsis: The Captain reprimands the player for trying to just walk away after presenting her with the artefact. The player is warned not to walk out of the room. If they try again, they will be attacked.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CRE_Main_Ago to 1392; -2; -772wait for the cinematic to endtalk to the captain and show her the artefacttry to leave the room through the front door

0.speaker: Kith'rak Therezzyn
0.text: Where do you think you're going? Take the artefact to the Inquisitor. Now.

1.speaker: Kith'rak Therezzyn
1.text: Any attempts to subvert me will result in your death.
